successes.title: tado° Cooling - Intelligent AC control
successes.description: tado° Cooling turns any AC unit into a smart device: Auto-off, precooling, indoor presence detection and single room control.

Pledges.description: SUPPORT THE GOOD CAUSE: Help fight climate change through the wonders of technology and bottom-up change. We will keep you updated on our progress via email. Thank you for bringing us closer to our goal!

EARLY BIRD PRODUCT: Be an early adopter! Get tado° Cooling, including the mobile app, for much cheaper than our future retail price of $149. The Early Bird edition is limited to 500 units and 1 unit per person.

EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER PRODUCT: No problem if you didn’t make the early bird cut. Only on Kickstarter can you still get tado° Cooling, including the mobile app, for $50 less than our future retail price of $149. If you have multiple A/C’s spread throughout the house, you can get a tado° for each room. Just multiply $99 with the number of units you need when you pledge (max. of 10).

LIMITED COLOR EDITION: Perfectly complement your home’s decor with your own custom-built color edition. Choose any color combination you can imagine for the back plate, cable and LED. This edition is strictly limited to 100 units, and 1 unit per person. Each unit will be marked with a limited edition serial number.

DEVELOPER PACKAGE: Do you recognize the potential in tado’s Internet-of-Things technology? Do you envision integrating tado’s functionality into other applications? Would you like the ability to control devices other than your A/C? The developer package includes a prototype which will be delivered before we start serial production. You will also get access to our SDK and documentation.

ELITE-GOLD DEVELOPER PACKAGE: You’ll get the Developer Kit plus a direct hotline to our tech team. You will receive an invitation to come visit us in Munich, to spend some time with the team and have an awesome day at the Oktoberfest. We’ll also give you some traditional Lederhosen or a Dirndl so you’ll show up in true Bavarian style. We will cover accommodation and all other expenses for your trip (flights to Germany excluded).
